-- Anachronox / Pacifix --

Anachronox nods, and proceeds to lift the second plate off. He 
carries it, with slight signs of the weight showing as he walks a 
few steps. With a quiet clang, the plate is set on top of the rest 
of them. 

He walks back to the rest of the plates, "Jetstorm, what is the 
chance of us doing battle during this mission?" He lifts another 
plate, and places it on top of the pile. He grasps another plate, 
and carefully removes it.

-------------------------

Pacifix returns to base and heads to his quarters. " *sigh* " He 
sits down and stops to think about Firedrill and shakes his head. 
Was there nothing he could do? It certaintly appeared to be so.

Remembering that Artemis was going on a recruiting mission, he gets 
up exits his quarters. "Hoist." he says, and a hologram of Hoist 
appears beside him, as he trudges through the halls, only a few more 
turns to the control room. "Hoist, I patch me through to Artemis. 
I'm not sure if she's out of comm range.

The holographic Hoist nods, "Alrighty Pacifix." He flickers for a 
sec, then speaks again, "Alright, you're good to go."

Pacifix nods, "Alright. Artemis, can you hear me? This is Pacifix. 
What is your status with this new bot, and what have you learned of 
him?




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Jetstorm: Let's just take it out of here. Now, just take the 
panels 
> out while I lock the crane in place.
> 
> The speakers boom on, and Daemos transmits a message.
> 
> Daemos: You two have to speed things up! Every minute we spend is 
a 
> minute the fruits do not have to mature. This means more 
casualties 
> for us on the Homeworlds!
> 
> OOC: Just say you take all the panels out, it'll be ok. They go as 
> soon as Gesper arrives.
